flawed_nl_solution:
When Dianne turns 30, Alex will be 30 x 2 = <<30*2=60>>60 years old.
Allison will be 30/2 = <<30/2=51>>51 years old then.
Dianne will turn 30 in 30 - 16 = <<30-16=14>>14 years.
Currently, the age of Alex is 60 - 14 = <<60-14=46>>46.
Currently, Allison is 51 - 14 = <<51-14=37>>37 year old.
So, the sum of Alex and Allison's ages now is 46 + 37 = <<46+37=83>>83 years old.
#### 83

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
